mapper.sql:
temp_action.action_id as temp_action_action_id, temp_action.menu_id as temp_action_menu_id, temp_action.panel_id as temp_action_panel_id, temp_action.action_cn_name as temp_action_action_cn_name, temp_action.action_en_name as temp_action_action_en_name, temp_action.icon_cls as temp_action_icon_cls, temp_action.type as temp_action_type, temp_action.disabled as temp_action_disabled, temp_action.method as temp_action_method, temp_action.order_num as temp_action_order_num, temp_action.remark as temp_action_remark
,temp_menu.menu_en_name as temp_action_menuEnName ,temp_menu.menu_cn_name as temp_action_menuCnName ,temp_panel.panel_cn_name as temp_action_panel_cn_name ,temp_panel.panel_en_name as temp_action_panel_en_name
LEFT JOIN t_menu temp_menu ON temp_action.menu_id = temp_menu.menu_id LEFT JOIN t_panel temp_panel ON temp_action.panel_id = temp_panel.panel_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_action (action_id, menu_id, panel_id, action_cn_name, action_en_name, icon_cls, type, disabled, method, order_num, remark) values (#{actionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{panelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_action
action_id,
menu_id,
panel_id,
action_cn_name,
action_en_name,
icon_cls,
type,
disabled,
method,
order_num,
remark,
